Key Match Events: Deepak Hooda made his debut as India batted in 1st T20I after losing the toss.
India made six changes from the last game with Sanju Samson, Jasprit Bumrah, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Yuzvendra Chahal, Ravindra Jadeja coming in, and Deepak Hooda making his T20I debut.
Pre-Game Insights: Ruturaj Gaikwad was initially supposed to play but he has got some wrist issue, so he is not available for this game.
Ruturaj Gaikwad complained of pain in his right wrist, which is affecting his batting. He was unavailable for selection for the first T20I. The BCCI Medical Team is examining him.
India was asked to bat first after Sri Lanka captain Dasun Shanaka won the toss.
